frame.name: Abandonment
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fex name="Agent">Agent</fex> leaves behind a <fex name="Theme">Theme</fex> effectively rendering it no longer within their control or of the normal security as one's property.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Carolyn</fex> <t>abandoned</t> <fex name="Theme">her car</fex> and jumped on a red double decker bus.</ex>
<ex>Perhaps <fex name="Agent">he</fex> <t>left</t> <fex name="Theme">the key</fex> in the ignition</ex>
<ex><t>Abandonment</t> <fex name="Theme">of a child</fex> is considered to be a serious crime in many jurisdictions.</ex>
There are also metaphorically used examples:
<ex><fex name="Agent">She</fex> <t>left</t> <fex name="Theme">her old ways</fex> <fex name="Place">behind</fex> .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Agent">Agent</fex> is the person who acts to leave behind the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Theme
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Theme">Theme</fex> is the entity that is relinguished to no one from the <fex name="Agent">Agent</fex>'s possession.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> gives up the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The style in which the <fen>Agent</fen> gives up the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>For what expanse of time the <fen>Agent</fen> has given up the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the act of abandonment logically follows.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The FE <fen>Depictive</fen> describes the <fen>Agent</fen> during the abandoning event.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Agent</fen> leaves the <fen>Theme</fen> behind.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that accomplishes the action indicated by the target.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Agent</fen> abandons the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Event_description
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of the event as a whole.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: leave.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: let remain in another place as abondoned

lexUnit.name: abandonment.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of relinquishing to no one

lexUnit.name: abandoned.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: the state of being left behind
